title: LOL Freezes entire computer
body: The last couple weeks any time I play the game will completly lock up my computer to the point where are hard reset is all that will fix it. I've updated drivers and turned off the Xbox game bar but still no luck. I'm running windows 10 and no other game has this issue.

replies.body: If your pc is only having issues when trying to run League, I'm wondering if it's due to some corrupted game files or if this is an issue with your pc hardware. Let's run a quick repair through the client options, but if that doesn't help go ahead and reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if something might be going wrong with your memory or ram.
